entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
